Unnamed: 9: First, you need to take your medication every day and come in for regular checkups. Second, you should eat a healthy diet and exercise regularly. These things will help you manage your illness and improve your quality of life.

Unnamed: 9: It's important to get your heart rate up for at least 30 minutes a day. Walking, jogging, biking, swimming, and dancing are all great options. Just find something that you enjoy and make it a part of your routine.
